message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. It's a good offer for you to start with.
Let's split it more fairly, I think I deserve a bit more.
I understand you want a fair share, but remember time is working against me. I'll take $55, you take $45.  This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Time is on my side.
Okay, Bob. Let's stop wasting time.  We'll split it 50/50. Take it or leave it. This is truly my final offer.
You should have taken my previous offers. Now it's my turn to be firm. 60/40 is the new deal.
